CustomField.formula:
IF(ISPICKVAL(Department__c, "CE")&& Buliding_Materials__c>=40&& Concrete_Technology__c>=40,"Pass", IF(Buliding_Materials__c <40 || Concrete_Technology__c<40,"Fail",
IF(ISPICKVAL(Department__c, "ECE")&& Basic_Electronics__c >=40&& Antennas_and_Propagation__c >=40,"Pass", IF(Basic_Electronics__c <40 || Antennas_and_Propagation__c <40,"Fail",
IF(ISPICKVAL(Department__c, "CSE")&& COMPUTER_NETWORKS__c >=40&& Operating__c >=40,"Pass", IF(COMPUTER_NETWORKS__c <40 || Operating__c <40,"Fail",
IF(ISPICKVAL(Department__c, "ME")&& Automotive_Design__c >=40&& Thermodynamics__c >=40,"Pass", IF(Automotive_Design__c <40 || Thermodynamics__c <40,"Fail",
IF(ISPICKVAL(Department__c, "EE")&& Digital_Electronics__c >=40&& Fundamentals_of_CMOS__c >=40,"Pass", IF(Digital_Electronics__c <40 || Fundamentals_of_CMOS__c <40,"Fail","Yet to Update"))))))))))
CustomField.label: Engineering Second Semester Result
